patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,20 +1,23 @@
 {
-  "name": "simple-bitcoin-node",
-  "version": "3.1.0",
-  "main": "server.js",
+  "name": "mini-bitcoin",
+  "version": "1.0.0",
+  "description": "Educational Bitcoin-like mini blockchain (Node.js)",
+  "main": "apps/blockchain/server.js",
   "scripts": {
-    "node": "node apps/blockchain/server.js",
-    "miner": "node apps/miner/server.js --address $ADDRESS",
-    "scanner": "node apps/scanner/server.js",
-    "keys": "node apps/generate-address.js",
-    "send": "node apps/send_tx.js --from $FROM_PUB --to $TO_PUB --amount $AMOUNT --fee $FEE"
+    "start:node": "node apps/blockchain/server.js",
+    "start:mineral": "node apps/miner/server.js --address $ADDRESS",
+    "start:miner": "node apps/miner/server.js --address $ADDRESS",
+    "start:scanner": "node apps/scanner/server.js",
+    "gen:key": "node apps/generate-address.js",
+    "send": "node apps/send_tx.js"
\ No newline at end of file
   },
   "dependencies": {
-    "axios": "^1.6.7",
-    "body-parser": "^1.20.2",
+    "axios": "^1.0.0",
+    "body-parser": "^1.20.0",
     "elliptic": "^6.5.4",
     "express": "^4.18.2",
-    "minimist": "^1.2.8",
-    "ws": "^8.18.0"
+    "minimist": "^1.2.7",
+    "stable-stringify": "^1.0.1",
+    "ws": "^8.13.0"
   }
-}
+}

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,22 +1,21 @@
 {
   "name": "mini-bitcoin",
-  "version": "1.0.0",
-  "description": "Educational Bitcoin-like mini blockchain (Node.js)",
+  "version": "1.1.0",
+  "description": "Educational Bitcoin-like blockchain with ECDSA, P2P and compact target bits",
   "main": "apps/blockchain/server.js",
   "scripts": {
-    "start:node": "node apps/blockchain/server.js",
-    "start:mineral": "node apps/miner/server.js --address $ADDRESS",
-    "start:miner": "node apps/miner/server.js --address $ADDRESS",
-    "start:scanner": "node apps/scanner/server.js",
+    "node": "node apps/blockchain/server.js",
+    "miner": "node apps/miner/server.js --address $ADDRESS",
+    "scanner": "node apps/scanner/server.js",
     "gen:key": "node apps/generate-address.js",
     "send": "node apps/send_tx.js"
   },
   "dependencies": {
-    "axios": "^1.0.0",
-    "body-parser": "^1.20.0",
+    "axios": "^1.7.0",
+    "body-parser": "^1.20.2",
     "elliptic": "^6.5.4",
-    "express": "^4.18.2",
-    "minimist": "^1.2.7",
-    "ws": "^8.13.0"
+    "express": "^4.19.2",
+    "minimist": "^1.2.8",
+    "ws": "^8.17.0"
   }
 }
